# DataCanopy

**Semantic versioning for ML datasets - simpler than DVC**

⚠️ **Status: In Development** - Package name reserved, full release coming soon.

DataCanopy will provide:
- Content-addressed dataset catalogs
- One-line dataset loading for ML engineers
- Logical views over Delta/Parquet in S3
- Local-first development with optional S3 sync

Stay tuned for the full release.

## Installation
```bash
pip install datacanopy  # Coming soon
```

## Links

- GitHub: https://github.com/datacanopy/datacanopy
- Documentation: Coming soon
